articles.description: All season long, No. 7 Texas Tech and No. 23 Oklahoma have been shining examples of two different ways to win games and gain national attention.
articles.headline: No. 7 Texas Tech aims to keep momentum vs. No. 23 Oklahoma

articles.description: Michigan State probably needs to win its remaining four games. It needs some help to capture the Big Ten regular-season title after an exhilarating home victory over Purdue on Saturday kept them in the race.
articles.headline: No. 2 Michigan State begins critical road stetch vs. Minnesota

articles.description: Jared Sam scored 18 points and grabbed 15 rebounds to help Southern beat Mississippi Valley State 55-51 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Sam's double-double leads Southern past MVSU 55-51

articles.description: Head coach Mike Brey says he likes Notre Dame's tempo and the way they are playing at the half down 4 to North Carolina.
articles.headline: Brey: 'We're right where we want to be'

articles.description: Virginia's home loss to rival Virginia Tech on Saturday didn't faze either the NCAA Men's Basketball Committee or media voters in the weekly Associated Press poll.
articles.headline: Virginia takes new No. 1 ranking to Miami
